title: Ukraine accuses Russia of genocide after bombing of children's hospital
content:
1. Ukraine accuses Russia of genocide after bombing of children's hospital  Reuters
  2. Ukraine accuses Russia of bombing children's hospital  CNN
  3. Video Russian strikes destroy children's hospital in Mariupol  ABC News
  4. Russian airstrike ravages children's hospital; White House warns Russia may use chemical weapons: Live Ukraine updates  USA TODAY
  5. Top Vatican official says reported bombing of Ukraine children's hospital 'unacceptable'  Reuters
